Review: Apartments are spacious, staff is very friendly and helpful and speaks good English. Located in a living quarter, so not much traffic. Good choice of Indian food, paper straws, not much plastic used

It is was close to our location we needed to go. Facility is very good & clean. They have Good Vegetarian restaurant. People in the restaurant are very friendly and help full. Food is good and tasty. Tasted the real vegetarian. room is like a suite. had a good pantry and good living space with a sofa in front of the TV.
awesome room size. very very comfortable
Breakfast could have been improved. However, was satisfactory and matches most of Expectations
The room was spacious and well designed. The location was also appropriate.
Breakfast was okay...could've added some more fresh fruits

Hotel Name: Diwa Club by Alila - A Hyatt Brand
Review: The warmth and hospitality of the staff was excellent. The spice restaurant was awesome. The separation from the main hotel was well thought out. The spa was excellent. All in all a very memorable experience marked as ' we will be back'

Hotel Name: Diwa Club by Alila - A Hyatt Brand
Review: The room we stayed in was very well maintained, spacious and the staff was very courteous. The all day bistro has the best food among their other restruants

Hotel Name: Diwa Club by Alila - A Hyatt Brand
Review: The service and the courtesy of the staff. Superb food too.
Loved the cleanliness, the sea view bungalow right on the beach. Lovely setting and staff. Comfortable room. Location is great, clean and peaceful beach
Location more than best, it's on beach Room are clean and comfortable At breakfast all is fresh Staff helpfull
